Articles.Content: So im looking for a large planet pack that runs quickly. I'm looking for quantity over quality, and the mod needs to be 1.4.5. Send me your suggestions!

How large is large? 

One possibility is Galileo's Planet Pack.  GPP has 2 stars and 29 planets/moons.  And with the addition of Grannus Expansion Pack, another 11 planets/moons are added.  You can also add Outer Planets Mod, which adds a third star and another 16 planets/moons.  So all together, that's 3 stars and 56 planets/moons.

I'm sure there are other good choices as well, but I'm not really familiar with anything other than GPP/GEP/OPM.

 

Edited October 21, 2018 by OhioBob
